plot: Fastidious Ferdinand haunts the steam laundry where a host of pretty girls is employed. He tries to force his attentions upon one of them, for which he is taught a lesson that he will never forget.
title: A Lesson to Mashers
plot_es: Fastidious Ferdinand haunts the steam laundry where a host of pretty girls is employed. He tries to force his attentions upon one of them, for which he is taught a lesson that he will never forget.
plot_en: Fastidious Ferdinand haunts the steam laundry where a host of pretty girls is employed. He tries to force his attentions upon one of them, for which he is taught a lesson that he will never forget.
